title: A Texas Christmas
description: In the Texas Panhandle, the winters are long, the storms fierce--and the Yuletide nights are sizzling. New York Times bestselling author Jodi Thomas along with Linda Broday, Phyliss Miranda and DeWanna Pace, bring you one tempting holiday delight. . .On the eve before Christmas a blizzard arrived, transforming a small Texas town into a night to remember. Four ladies desperately in need of saving, four hard-ridin' cowboys who aim to please. . . ONE WISH: A CHRISTMAS STORY by JODI THOMASWhen a lone farmer strides to a pretty store owner's rescue, their deepest wishes just might come true. . . NAUGHTY OR NICE by DEWANNA PACEA brave heiress can't believe a rugged angel is riding out of the night to save her and her fellow train passengers--until she gets him under the mistletoe. . . THE CHRISTMAS BELL by LINDA BRODAYA quiet loner wants to help a stranded widow have a holiday to remember. . . AWAY IN THE MANGER by PHYLISS MIRANDAAnd a female saloon owner tired of being scorned by respectable folk gets some very naughty help from a handsome greenhorn...
author: Jodi Thomas
